anime.description: * Based on a Taiwanese PC role-playing game series. http://anidb.net/ch98318 [In] and http://anidb.net/ch98317 [Nei] are two sisters who have wandering the land together ever since their village was destroyed by the villainous Taibai Empire. Their childhood friend, http://anidb.net/ch98320 [Shou], has been enslaved by the Taibai himself, and uses his brilliance at tinkering and inventing to get by as a slave to the Empire`s whims. One day, In accidentally discovers a legendary sword, which grants her fantastic abilities in combat, and allows her to summon a mystical, mechanical fox spirit named http://anidb.net/ch98939 [Yun], who is sworn to fight by her side. Meanwhile, Shou is making fast friends with a mysterious young girl who just may hold a great amount of power within the Taibai Empire. As Shou and the Fu sisters find themselves increasingly caught up in the Empire`s battle for supremacy over the land, it will take all of the magic and might that the budding resistance armies can muster to turn the tide of war once and for all. Source: ANN

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: setting
tag.description: The setting describes in what time and place an anime takes place. To a certain extent it describes what you can expect from the world in the anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: time
tag.description: This placeholder lists different epochs in human history and more vague but important timelines such as the future, the present and the past.

tag.name: past
tag.description: Anime that takes place in the past or clearly seems to take place in the past in case of an alternative universe. This category should almost always go together with one of its sub-categories, because the past can either be a depiction of a historical event(s) or not, in which case it would be alternative past.

tag.name: mecha
tag.description: Mecha in Japanese basically means mechanical things; everything from an electric whisk or a car to a spaceship or a robot. Here however we limit it to the more exotic things usually referred to as mecha anime: robots, whether controlled by a human or not, and their ilk. See Androids, Piloted Robots, Power Suits, Robot Helpers, Transforming Robots for a more specific classification.

tag.name: alternative past
tag.description: An anime that takes place in an alternative past is an anime that clearly does not belong to the future or the present, and isn`t tied particularly closely to our history, or has ties to our history but only as a premise: there are too many things that don`t make sense for the time-period. In some cases there is futuristic technology present, but the overall setting still feels that of the past. However the setting must still take place on Earth, since we can not know if the history of a fantasy world is an alternate one or not.

tag.name: science fiction
tag.description: Science fiction stories usually focus on how situations could be different in the future when we are more technologically advanced; due to either our own achievements or having met with other civilizations whom we have learned from.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: adventure
tag.description: Adventures are exciting stories, with new experiences or exotic locales. Adventures are designed to provide an action-filled, energetic experience for the viewer. Rather than the predominant emphasis on violence and fighting that is found in pure action anime, however, the viewer of adventures can live vicariously through the travels, conquests, explorations, creation of empires, struggles and situations that confront the main characters, actual historical figures or protagonists. Under the category of adventures, we can include traditional swashbucklers, serialized films, and historical spectacles, searches or expeditions for lost continents, "jungle" and "desert" epics, treasure hunts and quests, disaster films, and heroic journeys or searches for the unknown. Adventure films are often, but not always, set in an historical period, and may include adapted stories of historical or literary adventure heroes, kings, battles, rebellion, or piracy.

tag.name: disaster
tag.description: A disaster is a large-scale situation that causes great loss of or damage or threat to life, health, property, society, or the environment, irrespective of its source or cause. Disasters have substantial, long-lasting negative repercussions, and great effort must be spent in order to undo or mitigate their effects.

tag.name: tragedy
tag.description: Tragedy is a form of drama characterized by seriousness and dignity, usually involving a conflict between a character and some higher power, such as the law, the gods, fate, or society.

tag.name: war
tag.description: War is a phenomenon of organized violent conflict, typified by extreme aggression, societal disruption and adaptation, and high mortality. The objective of warfare differs in accord with a group`s role in a conflict: The goals of offensive warfare are typically the submission, assimilation or destruction of another group, while the goals of defensive warfare are simply the repulsion of the offensive force and, often, survival itself. Relative to each other, combatants in warfare are called enemies. The terms military, militant, and militarism each refer to fundamental aspects of war, i.e. the organized group, the combative individual, and the supportive ethos (respectively). Source: wiki

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 濫觴之故
The Beginning
Ranshou no Yue
滥殇之故
Lan Shang Zhi Gu
episode.summary: Traveling entertainers Yin and Ning are very close sisters. Yin cares for her armless sister as they travel between villages, putting on performances of swordplay and dancing. When they arrive in the ruins of a village, they find a mysterious bamboo writing strip. The strip glows, and from within it a strange girl and a single sword appear. Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire bent on conquering the Shenzhou region, a boy name Zhao is working as a slave. Zhou, who has been teaching himself engineering, meets a young girl one night. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 追憶之業
The Work of Memory
Tsuioku no Waza
追忆之业
Zhui Yi Zhi Ye
episode.summary: Three years ago, Yin, and Zhao lived together in a nomad settlement. The three of them were close childhood friends. The sisters loved Zhao like a brother, but that eventually turned into romantic love. While playing in the field as usual, they discover a broken construct. Zhao is drawn to the workings of the strange machine. Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire, Chief Engineer Mo Heng is working on Zhengtian, the ultimate weapon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲嘆之刀
The Sword of Sorrow
Hitan no Katana
episode.summary: The girl that appeared out of the tianshu bamboo writing strip is Yun, a doll made using Mujia. Yun calls the sword that appeared out of the tianshu the legendary Xuan Yuan Sword. Through Yun, Yin and Ning acquire new power. Meanwhile, with a single word from Empress Cheng, Zhao is made chief engineer. He now works on developing constructs. Mo Heng, who betrayed the empire and joined the rebel army, is also working on a new weapon he calls black fire armor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天命之戯
Fate`s Jest
Tenmei no Gi
episode.summary: Yin and Ning meet Tuoba Yuan and Can Lang during their travels. They are members of the rebel forces fighting against the Taibai Empire and invite the sisters to join them. They claim it is the duty of one who possesses the tianshu and the Xuan Yuan Sword. Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire, the recently promoted Zhao struggles with the development of new constructs. In order to give him a chance of pace, the mpress Long Cheng assigns Zhao to command a unit of constructs and travel the empire. However-- Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雄飛之勇
The Courage to Set Out
Yuuhi no Yuu
episode.summary: Yin and Ning run into a Taibai transport unit while traveling. They follow the unit to a farming village with bountiful fields. However, the Taibai official at the village grows fat while making the villagers suffer under heavy taxes. Ning wishes to fight against the soldiers in order to save the villagers, while Yin is concerned, and a mysterious woman appears before Yin. Meanwhile, Zhao, the commander of the construct unit, visits the official`s mansion. The official welcomes him but worries that his corruption will be exposed-- Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二人之絆
Their Bond
Futari no Kizuna
episode.summary: Sisters Yin and Ning are joined by rebel forces Yuezhi and Rou. When they are invited to join the rebel army, Ning enthusiastically agrees, but worried for her younger sister, Yin is opposed to the idea. Ning resists her sister`s concern for her. Meanwhile, Zhao reveals his concerns to Empress Cheng. Since the day of the tragedy three years ago, he has been unable to sleep. Furthermore, he is unable to forget what he`s seen. During the night, Zhao struggles with his memories of the tragedy, so Cheng begins showing him around the secret passages of the palace. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 錯綜之念
Complicated Feelings
Sakusou no Nen
episode.summary: Yin and Ning begin traveling towards the rebel base in order to meet Mo Heng, the man developing a new weapon. Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire, Construct Commander Meng Ji makes the decision to begin mass-producing the new model of construct. Zhao insists the new model is still a prototype and opposes its mass-production, but Commander Meng Ji claims they must hurry in order to conquer the world. Upon hearing their arguments, Empress Cheng also orders the mass-production of constructs. Zhao leaves his underlings to look after matters at the Construct Palace while he departs with the mobile unit in search of the magic-using rebels he fought previously. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒火之鎧
Black Fire Armor
Kuro Hi no Yoroi
episode.summary: Zhao begins seeking even more power; the power to acquire anything. He throws himself into researching black fire, the infinite power source discovered in the ancient Kuican ruins. The oblivious Chen promises she`ll promote Zhao. Meanwhile, Yin is worried about Ning. Concerned for Yin, the rebels suggest she become their sworn sister so that they may become family and fight together. However, their father Xiang Chu doesn`t think it`s a good idea. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謀略之宮
The Palace of Strategy
Bouryaku no Kyuu
episode.summary: The rebels are impressed by the combat power of the black fire armor, but the armor is incomplete and still has some problems. When Yin awakes, she has no memory of the fight due to the black fire`s influence. Mo Heng begins making adjustments to the black fire armor in order to finish it. Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire, Commander Meng Ji is demoted due to the destruction of the strike force. He is furious with Empress Cheng and Zhao. Zhao continues to research the black fire. Ning, who is saddened by his absence, lashes out at his servant Li Xiang. Suddenly, a mysterious enemy appears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 詰問之雫
The Drops of Interrogation
Kitsumon no Shizuku
episode.summary: Mo Heng completes the black fire armor in preparation for the battle against the Taibai Empire. Yin dons her armor and practices using magic. Ning is captured by the Taibai Empire and Zhao is arrested for sheltering a rebel. They meet with Empress Cheng and have a conversation in which they realize they are at cross purposes. Both Ning and Zhao receive unthinkable punishments. Meanwhile, Commander Meng Ji, who seeks Zhao`s downfall, and Lady Pang, who covets the imperial throne, have been meeting. An army is dispatched to the conquer the rebel base. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛憎之刃
The Blade of Love and Hate
Aizou no Yaiba
episode.summary: Excited by the power of the black fire armor, the rebels form a plan to attack the Taibai Empire. Yin resolves to rescue Ning. Meanwhile, construction on the zhengtian has begun in the Taibai Empire. Concerned for Ning, Zhao hurries the completion of the zhengtian in order to receive Empress Cheng`s forgiveness, even performing manual labor alongside the slaves. However, Ning has lost her mind. Cheng also suffers emotional wounds and hides in her room alone. Commander Meng Ji and Lady Pang use this opportunity to strike-- Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忘却之罪
The Guilt of Forgetfulness
Boukyaku no Tsumi
episode.summary: The Taibai Empire tests the zhengtian`s black fire cannon. Commander Meng Ji is satisfied by the results. Empress Cheng rewards Zhao for his achievement. However, though she is the empress, Empress Cheng is distraught over forcing her beloved Zhao to fight against his childhood friends. While worrying alone, she encounters Lady Pang`s daughter Juan. Meanwhile, upon hearing about the black fire cannon, Mo Heng realizes the Taibai Empire must have built the zhengtian. The rebels discuss plans to handle the zhengtian. Yin resolves to fight in order to see Ning and Zhao again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天空之要塞
The Sky Fortress
Tenkuu no Yousai
episode.summary: A battle takes place between the rebels attempting to destroy the incomplete zhengtian and the Taibai Empire trying to defeat them. Having gained a complete understanding of the situation, Empress Cheng is overwhelmed by feelings of guilt. Zhao gives Li a message for Cheng and encourages her to flee the battle. When Commander Meng Ji learns of Lady Pang`s failure, he decides to act before his own plot can be discovered. Both sides bring their full forces to the battlefield. Ning, who has lost her mind and hates her sister, runs into Yin, who is trying to save her. They cross blades, and-- Source: crunchyroll
